sentence.Network_en: I guess you would consider me my mama's proteg?
sentence.Network_cn: 我猜你们会把我看成妈妈的信徒?

list.abs: Moreover , I was His Majesty ' s special protege ., 不仅如此 , 我是这位皇帝陛下的特别宠儿.
新概念第三册精解 ... protector n. 保护者 protege n. 被保护者 punctually adv. 守时地.
a young protege of a famous violinist ., 某著名小提琴家的年轻门生.
